prompt: Develop a playful coming soon page with a centered layout and a fun, colorful aesthetic. Feature a bold 'Coming Soon' title in a rounded, purple (hex: #8E24AA) font with a slight tilt effect. Include a subtitle in a handwritten-style font in dark gray, announcing the appâ€™s exciting launch. Display a linear progress indicator with a pink (hex: #EC407A) bar and a percentage text below. Add an email input field with rounded corners and a yellow (hex: #FBC02D) subscribe button. Place social media icons (Twitter, Instagram, Facebook) in a horizontal row at the top of the page. Use a light pastel blue (hex: #B3E5FC) background with moderate padding and playful spacing. The design should feel cheerful, engaging, and youthful.
